Articles.Content:
Well, as soon as Kerbals learn't docking, they were straight on the case for a Space Station, so of course, I did one, of course using the docking mod, I mean, why not? right?

I find the docking mod extremely useful for this space station, it's progress will be constantly *updated

And for the other images, just so I don't flood this thread with images:

More Images!

*Last state:

Kosmos pack, Orbital-Rendezvous-and-Docking-Assistant

Edited September 16, 2012 by Munstation
I would just like to notify everyone that while in the process of docking the Sa - 1 Truss segment, the station had violently blown all the docking ports off, as shown in this image:
Could you by any chance put the S.S Polaris up for download? I would love to be able to use this design.
Could you help me? I'm just wondering which decoupler do you put on the space station and the rocket your going to dock?

Could you help me? I'm just wondering which decoupler do you put on the space station and the rocket your going to dock?

Make sure your using the docking mod

Other then that, use the Target decoupler (Decal tab in VAB) for the 'receiver' port (I.e Space station) and the system for the rocket, or the next module.

Recommended module design:

Using a target decoupler, put that on the 'Core' module, The system decoupler connects only to that.

Using a system decoupler, put that on the Module/Docking vessel, The target decoupler is the only decoupler able to be connected to.

Make sure your using the docking mod

Other then that, use the Target decoupler (Decal tab in VAB) for the 'receiver' port (I.e Space station) and the system for the rocket, or the next module.

Recommended module design:

Using a target decoupler, put that on the 'Core' module, The system decoupler connects only to that.

Using a system decoupler, put that on the Module/Docking vessel, The target decoupler is the only decoupler able to be connected to.

Ok, thanks.

Could you by any chance put the S.S Polaris up for download? I would love to be able to use this design.

This is in multiple modules, as it used the docking mod.

Was hard enough to get it to be in that stage because the docking mod will cause it to slowly *move out of place* and sometimes that can lead to fatal flaws if let un-attended.

I would of gave you the persistence file, but of course, the stations already blew up.

Sorry.
Yeah, my station detonated as well after a while. seems to be a bug with docking. Oh well. back to the drawing board

Yeah, my station detonated as well after a while. seems to be a bug with docking. Oh well. back to the drawing board

Are you using Hogs docking mod?
Yes I am. I've actually tried both at this moment. Still random inexplicable detonations

the solar panels are not working

any help or tips?
